backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing CRUD operations for products stored in a Map with auto-incrementing Nat IDs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two frontend type‑normalization fixes tied to specific files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing components, hooks, types, and styling behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/styles defining OKLCH color variables, theme tokens, and light/dark mode CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting page metadata and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing login, roles, product/order state, notifications, and cross‑tab order detection.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin interface for adding, editing, and deleting products with validation, dialogs, image upload, and toasts.
frontend/src/components/HowToAddProducts: Instructional card showing step‑by‑step guidance for adding products with icons and alerts.
frontend/src/components/LoginView.tsx: Login form handling username/password validation and determining admin vs customer roles.
frontend/src/components/OrdersPanel.tsx: Admin panel component that displays customer orders grouped by customer and supports clearing all order history with confirmation.
frontend/src/components/ShopView.tsx: Product listing UI that sorts by sales, supports search, and allows placing orders with loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Manages local order storage with add, clear, and persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: React Query–based hook for fetching and mutating products through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme color variables and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/productMapping.ts: Utilities to convert product data between backend bigint formats and UI string formats, including price and ID parsing.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a Tailwind class merging helper and a function to extract safe error messages.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/types/order.ts: Defines the Order interface with product name, creation date, and optional customer name.
frontend/src/types/product.ts: Defines the Product interface with id, name, price, and optional image.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theming, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state, known issues, and features related to fixing product ID type mismatches.
